name: Switch On (mm00)
description:
Objective: 
  • Switch all the squares on!
Controls:
  • just click :)

My entry for Trijam 142! This is the first game i've been able to "finish" and the first game jam where I actually submit something! I hope I'll be able to make more advanced stuff in the future, but for the moment enjoy this little puzzle game I made in 2 hours, 58 minutes and 9 seconds!

Engine used: Godot

Credits:

Background music: Next to You by Joth
